amendment.description: An amendment numbered 85 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce the salary of Council on Environmental Quality Chair Brenda Mallory to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 251 (Roll no. 579).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A037) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 251 (Roll no. 579).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
